General.Name: Zhe Jiang Dong Ri Ltd Co
General.Description: Zhejiang Dongri Limited Company engages in the marketing of lamps and accessories, and wholesale of agricultural products. The company is also involved in the gas production, agricultural and sideline products distribution, software development, transportation, and financial investment activities. Zhejiang Dongri Limited Company was founded in 1997 and is based in Wenzhou, China.
